description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Climb through 9 levels (45 stages!) of increasing difficulty to the top of the temples. Multiplayer's even more fun so get your friends and race to the top.
description.short: Climb through 9 levels (45 stages!) of increasing difficulty to the top of the temples. Multiplayer's even more fun so get your friends and race to the top.
